item.description:
Hi Members,

Our meetup was scheduled for july 17th, but I have had to change the date to July 24th, Sunday, from 1-4pm.  Hopefully this won't inconvenience anyone.

At the last meet, one of our members brought her two adorable dogs who proved to be too anxious and unsocialized to participate in the meet.  The owner worked hard to reassure them and keep them from growling at other dogs, but it proved too difficult.  If anyone has this type of dog, we highly recommend that you contact Pete Westland, Holliston Meadows trainer, at  (774) 249 9808   and work with him until your dog(s) can comfortably be around other dogs that they don't know (before  attending our meet.)

I look forward to seeing you all again on July 24th!

Kim

group.name: The Massachusetts Small Breed Dogs Meetup Group

item.name: Mass. Small Breed Dogs Meetup Group
